scripts.start-local: export MOCK_DIR=../app && export destinations=`cat default-env.json | jq .destinations` && export VCAP_SERVICES=`cat default-env.json | jq .VCAP_SERVICES` && node node_modules/@sap/html5-repo-mock/index.js --flp --sap-ui-bootstrap-url https://ui5.sap.com --ui5 {"version": "1.108.13", "theme": "sap_horizon"}
